title: 1911 Obak Spider Baum (Scrap) SGC AUT for Sale...lower price!

posts.post_title: 1911 Obak Spider Baum (Scrap) SGC AUT for Sale...lower price!
posts.post_content:
Whole lot of goofiness going on with this one.  Missing color passes, off-register and a wavy uneven cut all around.  Popular PCL player and a neat horizontal pose too!  Asking $340 delivered.....

Thanks in advance,
Brian

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=252669&d=1480469787[/IMG]

Brian, 

That is one "Bit€!n Camaro."  I don't know if you know the song by the Dead Milkmen, but it is very punk rock.  So is that card!  Love it.
Got several nibbles on this one but no sale as of yet.  Will lower the price down to $340 delivered to see if that helps things along :)
